name: Fireworks Simulator 2017
description:
This is a small game made for Game Maker's Toolkit Jam in 48h.

You have a budget to fire some rockets, each rocket has a cost but you can gain money back by firing them in certain sequences. If you reach 0$ you lose.

You can play with X360 / XOne gamepad or the keyboard.

It's in a prototype state for the moment but don't hesitate to give me feedback in the comments section: this is much appreciated.
